error.mqtt: Sorry, there was a communication error with the Snips platform.
error.config: Sorry, there was an error with your config file.
error.localisation: Sorry, there was an error with your language settings.
error.intentNotRecognized: Sorry, I did not understand your request.
error.durationTooLong: Sorry, the maximum snooze time is 1 hour.

info.expired_name: The alarm named {{ name }} is up!

info.scheduled: I set an alarm for {{ time }}.
info.scheduled_name: I set an alarm named {{ name }} for {{ time }}.
info.scheduled_recurrence: I set an alarm for {{ recurrence }}.
info.scheduled_name_recurrence: I set an alarm named {{ name }} for {{ recurrence }}.

ask.time: When do you want to schedule your alarm?

info.noAlarmFound: It seems that you have no alarm set for the moment.
info.noSuchAlarmFound: It seems that you have no such alarm set for the moment.

head.found_name: I found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} named {{ name }}.
head.found_time: I found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} set for {{ time }}.
head.found_recurrence: I found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} set for {{ recurrence }}.
head.found_time_recurrence: I found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} set for {{ recurrence }} at {{ time }}.
head.found_time_name: I found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} named {{ name }} set for {{ time }}.
head.found_recurrence_name: I found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} named {{ name }} set for {{ recurrence }}.
head.found_time_recurrence_name: I found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} named {{ name }} set for {{ recurrence }} at {{ time }}.

list.scheduled_name: An alarm named {{ name }} is set for {{ time }}.
list.scheduled_recurrence_name: An alarm named {{ name }} is set for {{ recurrence }}.
list.singleAlarm_name: Its name is {{ name }} and it is set for {{ time }}.
list.singleAlarm_recurrence_name: Its name is {{ name }} and it is set for {{ recurrence }}.

ask.confirm: I found one alarm, are you sure you want to cancel it?
ask.confirmAll: I found {{ number }} alarms, are you sure you want to cancel all of them?
